ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

name: Tree of Savior - MAY 2020 OST Collection

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Tree of Savior (English Ver.) Soundtrack Content - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Tree of Savior - MAY 2020 OST Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 84 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 605 MB available space

short_description: Tree of Savior 2020 May collection provides 16 different tracks, including exclusive soundtrack only available on DLC.
